events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your site, but it doesn’t fit and I would like to request a refund or exchange.
The case has been categorized under Refund following the customer’s request for a money back or exchange.
An agent has been assigned to assist with the refund request for the returned jacket order.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us regarding your jacket. I’m here to help you with your refund or exchange.
Could you please provide the order number and specify if you prefer a refund or an exchange for a different size?
My order number is 4587963. I would prefer a refund as I don't want a different size, thank you.
Thank you for the details. We have initiated the refund process and it should reflect in your account within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick help! I appreciate the prompt refund initiation and your support.
The refund request has been successfully processed, and the case is now resolved.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please reach out if any further assistance is required.
Since we haven’t heard back, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
We have sent you a short survey to help us improve our service. Your feedback is greatly appreciated.
